Later Piers Morgan wants to discuss Michael Vick , the dog-fighting NFL player, and Oprah Winfrey responds, I really don't want to talk about Michael Vick because I'm trying to interview him. Piers Morgan laughs and says he appreciates her honesty. They then bet 200 British pounds on who will get the first Michael Vick interview between them.
